mapper.select: select a._name as name, a._sex as sex, a._phone as phone, a._invite_code as inviteCode, a._register_time as registerTime, b._cost_city as costCity, d._type as carType, count(*) as times, sum(c._cost_real_money) as costMoney from tsp_caocao_custumer a, tsp_caocao_order b, tsp_caocao_customer_bill_info c, tsp_caocao_car d where b._customer_id = a._id and a._type = 1 and c._order_id = b._id and b._car_id = d._id and a._name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a._phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DATE_FORMAT(_register_time , '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{qualifiedDateBegin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(_register_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{registerDateEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%Y-%m-%d') group by a._id

select a._id as id, a._name as name, a._sex as sex, a._phone as phone, a._citycode as cityCode, sum(b._cost_real_money) as costMoney from tsp_caocao_custumer a, tsp_caocao_customer_bill_info b where a._type=1 and a._id = b._customer_id and a._name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a._phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a._citycode = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select b._createtime as costDate, b._start_price as startPrice, b._distance as distance, b._driver_minute as driverMinutes, b._cost_money as costMoney, b._discount_money as discountMoney, b._cost_real_money as realMoney, b._privilege_code as privilegeCode, a._cost_city as costCity, a._start_location as startLocation, a._end_location as endLocation, c._type as carType from tsp_caocao_order a, tsp_caocao_customer_bill_info b, tsp_caocao_car c where a._id = b._order_id and a._car_id = c._id and a._id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and DATE_FORMAT(b._createtime, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{costDateBegin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(b._createtime, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{costDateEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%Y-%m-%d')
